campuscuts1.name: Campus Cuts Barbershop
campuscuts1.faqs: Q: Do you take walk-ins? A: Yes. Q: Do you take cards? A: Yes, we accept cash, card, and Apple Pay.

downtown_dentist1.name: Downtown Dental Clinic
downtown_dentist1.faqs: Q: Do you take insurance? A: Yes, most major plans. Q: Do you accept walk-ins? A: Emergencies only.
